mapper.insert: insert into GREENPOINT (GREENPOINTID, GREENPOINTVALUE, GREENPOINTTYPE, GREENPOINTDATE,GREENPOINTCONTENT, USERID,COMPID) VALUES (#{greenPointId}, #{greenPointValue}, #{greenPointType}, now(),#{greenPointContent}, #{userId} , #{compId})
mapper.select: select GREENPOINTID, GREENPOINTVALUE, GREENPOINTTYPE, GREENPOINTDATE,GREENPOINTCONTENT, USERID,COMPID from GREENPOINT where USERID = #{id}
